body_html:
@GHAIGIT @ispirmustafa is correct. Here is my implementation which works well:

fc_yaw_train_op = fc_optimizer.minimize(yaw_total_loss, var_list=fc_yaw_variables)
fc_pitch_train_op = fc_optimizer.minimize(pitch_total_loss, var_list=fc_pitch_variables)
fc_roll_train_op = fc_optimizer.minimize(roll_total_loss, var_list=fc_roll_variables)

train_ops = tf.group(fc_yaw_train_op, fc_pitch_train_op, fc_roll_train_op)
body_text:
@GHAIGIT @ispirmustafa is correct. Here is my implementation which works well:
fc_yaw_train_op = fc_optimizer.minimize(yaw_total_loss, var_list=fc_yaw_variables)
fc_pitch_train_op = fc_optimizer.minimize(pitch_total_loss, var_list=fc_pitch_variables)
fc_roll_train_op = fc_optimizer.minimize(roll_total_loss, var_list=fc_roll_variables)

train_ops = tf.group(fc_yaw_train_op, fc_pitch_train_op, fc_roll_train_op)
body:
@GHAIGIT @ispirmustafa is correct. Here is my implementation which works well:

```
fc_yaw_train_op = fc_optimizer.minimize(yaw_total_loss, var_list=fc_yaw_variables)
fc_pitch_train_op = fc_optimizer.minimize(pitch_total_loss, var_list=fc_pitch_variables)
fc_roll_train_op = fc_optimizer.minimize(roll_total_loss, var_list=fc_roll_variables)

train_ops = tf.group(fc_yaw_train_op, fc_pitch_train_op, fc_roll_train_op)
```
